#### Packages: 
```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

#### Data:
```{r, data}
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")

homicides_clean <- homicides %>%
  filter(city == "Baltimore") %>%
  unite("victim_name", victim_first, victim_last, sep = " ") %>%
  mutate(victim_name = str_to_title(victim_name),
         reported_date = ymd(reported_date),
         month = month(reported_date, label = TRUE),
         year = year(reported_date),
         colors = case_when(month %in% c("Mar", "Apr", "May", 
                                         "Jun", "Jul", "Aug") ~ "gray68",
                            month %in% c("Jan", "Feb", "Sep",
                                         "Oct", "Nov", "Dec") ~ "lightblue1",
                            TRUE ~ "other")) %>%
  group_by(month, year) %>%
  count() %>%
  ungroup()
```
